query:
SELECT
            CASE
                WHEN p.owner_id = ? THEN 1
                WHEN ps.permission = 'write' THEN 1
                ELSE 0
            END as has_permission
        FROM playlists p
        LEFT JOIN playlist_shares ps ON p.id = ps.playlist_id AND ps.shared_with_user_id = ?
        WHERE p.id = ?
        LIMIT 1
